intro: Elatostema laciniatum var. incaudatum, commonly known as the narrow-leaf elatostema, is a species of flowering plant in the family Urticaceae. It is native to tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil and Peru. The plant is characterized by its small, heart-shaped leaves with finely serrated edges. It produces tiny greenish-white flowers that are clustered in dense inflorescences. This variant is often found in shaded, moist environments such as forest understories and rocky crevices.
